thread.title: Danielle
thread.title_full: Colonial Properties Cabin & Resort Rentals reviewed by Danielle

author: Danielle
title: Danielle
text: Colonial properties is a great company to book from. I have just booked my 2nd trip with the them and love the service. From complimentary attraction tickets to amazing properties, Colonial is a great company to book from. they give you a courtesy call and check in on you. Having to chose a cabin for my family is one of the hardest things to do, o and to wait to go on vacation is a close second.
